title: What is the role of consciousness and quantum mechanics in shaping our reality and perception of time?
first_phrase: The last part of this text delves into the concept that in a quantum universe, our consciousness and observation have the power to shape reality. It challenges the idea of separate entities and emphasizes the importance of understanding the whole. It discusses the urgency of our time and the need to expand our consciousness to access new levels of reality. The text cites various sources, including spiritual and philosophical teachings, to provide a comprehensive understanding of the topic. It concludes with the assertion that this book serves as a starting point for readers to transcend their limitations and access the true reality of the universe.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the work of consciousness in perception cannot be reduced to that of a machine. Our perception is shaped by our own perspectives and experiences. The mirror serves as a useful analogy for understanding this concept. To transcend these limitations of perception, one can turn to the book "Medicina di Primo Grado" as a starting point and explore techniques such as separating fixed identifications and practicing present-mindedness. Ultimately, the goal is to sublimate and purify oneself to rediscover their true essence. Respiratory techniques, symbolized by the eagle, can be a useful tool in this process.
